name: NSRunningApplication
desc: An object that can manipulate and provide information for a single instance of an app.

items.name: runningApplications
items.desc: Returns an array of currently running applications with the specified bundle identifier.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns an NSRunningApplication representing this application.

items.name: isActive
items.desc: Indicates whether the application is currently frontmost.

items.name: activate
items.desc: Attempts to activate the application using the specified options.

items.name: activationPolicy
items.desc: Indicates the activation policy of the application.

items.name: m NSApplication.ActivationPolicy
items.desc: Activation policies (used by activationPolicy) that control whether and how an app may be activated.

items.name: hide
items.desc: Attempts to hide or the application.

items.name: unhide
items.desc: Attempts to unhide or the application.

items.name: isHidden
items.desc: Indicates whether the application is currently hidden.

items.name: localizedName
items.desc: Indicates the localized name of the application.

items.name: icon
items.desc: Returns the icon for the receiver’s application.

items.name: bundleIdentifier
items.desc: Indicates the CFBundleIdentifier of the application.

items.name: bundleURL
items.desc: Indicates the URL to the application's bundle.

items.name: executableArchitecture
items.desc: Indicates the executing processor architecture for the application.

items.name: executableURL
items.desc: Indicates the URL to the application's executable.

items.name: launchDate
items.desc: Indicates the date when the application was launched.

items.name: isFinishedLaunching
items.desc: Indicates whether the receiver’s process has finished launching,

items.name: processIdentifier
items.desc: Indicates the process identifier (pid) of the application.

items.name: ownsMenuBar
items.desc: Returns whether the application owns the current menu bar.

items.name: forceTerminate
items.desc: Attempts to force the receiver to quit.

items.name: terminate
items.desc: Attempts to quit the receiver normally.

items.name: isTerminated
items.desc: Indicates that the receiver’s application has terminated.

items.name: terminateAutomaticallyTerminableApplications
items.desc: Terminates invisibly running applications as if triggered by system memory pressure.
